data.introduce: 上票服务，是用于已经没有余票的无用打票机提供上票服务，使得该打票机可以继续出票，对余票不足的打票机上票之前需要先进行卸票操作。
data.business: 对没有余票的打票机，进行上票操作。
data.functions:
支持CRS系统BSP票证上票
支持CRS系统本票票证上票
暂不支持：
支持ICS系统本票票证上票
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_LoadTicketRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"上票请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"公司代码","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"LoadTicketRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"上票请求对象","children":[{"name":"PrintNO","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[{"name":"@PrintNO","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]}]},{"name":"StartTN","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起始票号","children":[{"name":"@StartTN","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"起始票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"PoolNO","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票池号","children":[{"name":"@PoolNO","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票池号","children":[]}]},{"name":"TktNumber","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"上票张数","children":[{"name":"@TktNumber","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"上票张数","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"C","description":"系统类型:B,C","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_LoadTicketRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"上票返回","children":[{"name":"LoadTicketResult","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"上票结果","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"？：至多一个","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DeviceInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"打票机信息，上票成功时返回","children":[{"name":"@Mode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机的工作方式：TIME-INITIALIZE（定时式）；DEMAND（请求式）；BOTH（并存式）；","children":[]},{"name":"@NACK","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数据传输是否正常的标志；正常情况下为空白，不正常为‘X","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机工作状态 UP/DOWN","children":[]},{"name":"@InputStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"输入状态 ACTIVE/INACTIVE","children":[]},{"name":"@OutputStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"输出状态 ACTIVE/INACTIVE","children":[]},{"name":"@Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打印机所属Office","children":[]},{"name":"@PID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机PID","children":[]},{"name":"@ControlPID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"控制终端PID","children":[]},{"name":"@ControlAgent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"建立控制的工作号","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机可以接受的货币代码，以及各种货币所\n                                                要求保留的小数点位数","children":[]},{"name":"@DeviceAttribute","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机属性，该打票机是否电子客票打票机","children":[]},{"name":"@DeviceType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机类型：区分国内/国际，BSP/本票","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketAttach","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票证归属","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketAvail","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"可用票号数","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketCount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"等待打印的客票数","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumberBegin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"当前票号段起始票号","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumberEnd","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"当前票号段结束票号","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumberLatest","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打印的最后一张客票的票号","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -9999 ","name":null,"msg":" unknown error!  ","msgZh":" 未知错误 "},{"code":" -305 ","name":null,"msg":" transaction times limited ","msgZh":" 访问次数限制 "},{"code":" -304 ","name":null,"msg":" sending commands too fast, try again later ","msgZh":" 访问速度过快,请稍后再试 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office prermission denied ","msgZh":" 没有office权限 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Office code is empty ","msgZh":" office代码为空 "},{"code":" -540 ","name":null,"msg":" airline code is empty ","msgZh":" 航空公司代码为空 "},{"code":" -82650 ","name":null,"msg":" tickets not issued to office ","msgZh":" 该office没有此票号段 "},{"code":" -82651 ","name":null,"msg":" must use tickets sequential next - xxx ","msgZh":" 票号段必须在XXX之后开始 "},{"code":" -82652 ","name":null,"msg":" ticket machine serial number is incorrect ","msgZh":" 打票机序号不正确 "},{"code":" -82653 ","name":null,"msg":" tickets have been used or just in use by other ","msgZh":" 票号段已被使用或者只能被其他打票机使用 "},{"code":" -82654 ","name":null,"msg":" ticket machine also has unused tickets ","msgZh":" 打票机还有未使用的票号 "},{"code":" -82655 ","name":null,"msg":" the ticket machine already has a control terminal ","msgZh":" 打票机已被其他账号建控，无法建控添加客票 "},{"code":" -82656 ","name":null,"msg":" UC FAILED:OFFICE ","msgZh":" 切换office错误,请更换office "},{"code":" -82657 ","name":null,"msg":" do not use central pool ","msgZh":" 不能使用中央池 "}]
